modify_description: Changed step28's agent from ck_plan_agent to ck_end_agent, violating the orchestration sequence requiring plan agent to complete tasks before end agent takes over
Modified step28's tool call to use ask_llm with preliminary, unvalidated data from step27 instead of waiting for plan agent's finalized data
Updated steps29-31 to reflect ck_end_agent outputting the wrong answer based on the premature LLM query
causality_chain: Orchestration Error at step28: Premature switch from ck_plan_agent to ck_end_agent before plan agent completed data verification and finalization -> end agent uses unvalidated preliminary data to query LLM -> LLM returns incorrect difference of 22 -> wrong final answer
